pullrequest.title: Move audio to link, and playback on contact

content.raw:
Well the collisions generate sound at contact, so that seems like `audio_source` to me, and the collision is a good place to put those.

`audio_sink` seems like a microphone to me, which seems like a sensor, which are normally attached to links. This current setup implies that if you want something to have an audio_sink, then it must have a collision element. We don't currently require all links to have collisions.

It's not a big deal; it feels nit-picky to me, but I wanted to express it.
